title: Initialize (Method)
text:
METHOD Initialize : BOOL
Method Initialize must be called in order to pass an already existing CharBufferPtr
to this instance. In this case the buffer size is unknown and remains 0. This method
can be used if the string is read only.

rows.Name: cbpSource
rows.Comment:
The buffer, where the string is stored this instance
represents

rows: A __SYSTEM.TYPE_CLASS value indicating type of the string
